newsArray.title: IND vs SA: Team India to play in Chandigarh's new stadium for the first time, know how the players performed in the IPL matches
newsArray.description: The Indian team started the T20 series against South Africa with a big win. In the match played in Cuttack, the Suryakumar Yadav-led Indian team bowled out South Africa for just 74 runs and won the match by 101 runs. The second match of the series is scheduled to take place on Thursday, December 11, [...]
creator: Anderson

newsArray.title: Sachin Tendulkar fulfills 15-year-old promise to teammate whose selfless act helped him debut for India
newsArray.description: Sachin Tendulkar has fulfilled a 15-year-old promise to a former teammate whose selfless act-batting through severe pain to support him-helped clear the path for his India debut. The gesture highlights a touching, little-known chapter from Sachin's early career.
creator: chankesh rao

newsArray.description: Karnataka Deputy Chief Minister DK Shivakumar said on Wednesday that a decision on allowing the Indian Premier League (IPL) matches at Chinnaswamy Stadium would be taken after discussing it in Thursday's Cabinet meeting.

newsArray.title: I want to be clear: we are not a pub, but we're competing with wealthy clubs and, to do that, we need the bar
newsArray.description: A cricket club which ‘unknowingly breached’ its licensing conditions has been granted permission to hold events and sell alcohol to non-members despite a flood of objections by local residents. Shaw Cricket Club on Mark Lane applied for a change of its license terms, stating it was ‘crucial to its survival as a community club’.
creator: Charlotte Hall

newsArray.title: Year Ender 2025: List Of Cricketers Who Retired This Year - Rohit Sharma, Virat Kohli, Nicholas Pooran And... Check Full List
newsArray.description: The year 2025 marked the end of an era for world cricket as several prominent international players across formats and countries announced their retirement. From explosive white-ball specialists to reliable Test anchors, this year's list of retirees reflects a generational shift in global cricket dynamics.
keywords: cricket players who retired this year
